name: Copper Ore
description: A metal ore found in nature. The first metal used by humans.

name: Tin Ore
description: A soft metal ore. Used to make bronze.

name: Bronze
description: An alloy of copper and tin. Harder than pure copper.

name: Copper Ingot
description: A block of refined copper.

name: Tin Ingot
description: A block of refined tin.

name: Bronze Sword
description: A weapon made from bronze. Superior to stone weapons.

name: Bronze Axe
description: A tool made from bronze. More durable than stone.

name: Bronze Spear
description: A weapon made from bronze.

name: Bronze Shield
description: A defensive item made from bronze.

name: Bronze Helmet
description: Protective headgear made from bronze.

name: Bronze Armor
description: Protective clothing made from bronze.

name: Bronze Chisel
description: A tool for carving and shaping.

name: Bronze Saw
description: A cutting tool made from bronze.

name: Bronze Nail
description: A fastener made from bronze.

name: Bronze Mirror
description: A polished bronze surface that reflects light.

name: Bronze Coin
description: A form of currency made from bronze.

name: Wheel
description: A circular device that enables transportation.

name: Cart
description: A vehicle with wheels. Used for transporting goods.

name: Chariot
description: A two-wheeled vehicle pulled by animals. Used in warfare.

name: Road
description: A paved path for easier travel.

name: Bridge
description: A structure for crossing rivers and valleys.

name: Architecture
description: The art of designing and constructing buildings.

name: Column
description: A vertical support structure. Used in buildings.

name: Stone Block
description: A precisely cut stone. Used in construction.

name: Lime Mortar
description: A binding material made from lime. Used in construction.

name: City Wall
description: A defensive structure surrounding a city.

name: Gate
description: A fortified entrance to a city.

name: Tower
description: A tall structure for observation and defense.

name: Temple
description: A building for religious worship.

name: Palace
description: A grand building for rulers.

name: Writing System
description: A method of recording information.

name: Clay Tablet
description: A writing surface made from clay.

name: Stylus
description: A tool for writing on clay tablets.

name: Seal
description: A carved object used to mark documents.

name: Scroll
description: A rolled document made from papyrus or parchment.

name: Papyrus
description: A writing material made from reeds.

name: Ink
description: A liquid used for writing.

name: Calendar
description: A system for tracking time and seasons.

name: Mathematics
description: The study of numbers and calculations.

name: Abacus
description: A calculating tool using beads.

name: Compass
description: A tool for navigation using magnetic fields.

name: Map
description: A representation of geographical features.

name: Currency
description: A standardized medium of exchange.

name: Marketplace
description: A place for trade and commerce.

name: Merchant
description: A person who trades goods.

name: Trade Route
description: A path used for commercial exchange.

name: Scale
description: A tool for weighing goods.

name: Weights
description: A standardized set for measuring weight.

name: Standardized Measure
description: A consistent unit of measurement.

name: Legal Code
description: A written system of laws.
